BodyCenteredCubicCell
=====================
The BodyCenteredCubicCell provides a class definition for a generation of unit cells
with a body-centered cubic distribution of the inclusions. The class inherits from the
GenericUnitCell class and extends it in order to specify the remaining
placeholder methods of the GenericModel. Especially, methods to determine the
cells size and place the inclusions are provided.

----------------

   :show-inheritance:
   :members:
